meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a sewer.
meanings.sent1: The dark, damp basement had a sewerlike smell.
meanings.sent2: The alley behind the restaurant was sewerlike in its filth and odor.
meanings.sent3: The old, abandoned house had a sewerlike charm that attracted curious explorers.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were sewerlike, overflowing with trash and debris.
meanings.sent5: The sewerlike atmosphere of the tunnel made it difficult to breathe.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a sewer.
meanings.sent1: The sewerlike pipes were clogged with debris.
meanings.sent2: The sewerlike conditions in the basement were unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The sewerlike appearance of the alley made it a perfect setting for a horror movie.
meanings.sent4: The sewerlike stench permeated the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The sewerlike tunnels were dark and foreboding.
